items.title: Stocks Post Biggest Drop in Months as Tensions Over Greenland Mount
items.description: The S&P 500 dropped over 2 percent on Tuesday, its biggest decline since October.

items.title: We’re Still Talking About Bernie Goetz After All These Years
items.description: Two new books return to the ’80s-era saga of Bernie Goetz to consider the 21st-century intersections of race, crime and sensationalism.
